rules_text:
Corpse Thief can’t be blocked by creatures with greater power.
Whenever Corpse Thief deals combat damage to a player, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
{3}{G}{G}: Mill half your library, rounded down. Transform Corpse Thief. Activate only as a sorcery.
rules_text2:
Copse Tyrant can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
Spells and abilities your opponents control can’t cause cards to leave your graveyard.
Whenever Copse Tyrant deals combat damage to a player, return up to two target permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand.
